title: Tuesday Sector Leaders: Precious Metals, Water Utilities - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Tuesday, precious metals shares were relative leaders, up on the day by about 2.7%. Leading the group were shares of Endeavour Silver ( EXK  ), up about 15.5% and shares of Alexco Resource ( AXU  ) up about 13.4% on the day.      Also showing relative strength are water utilities shares, up on the day by about 0.5% as a group, led by American Water Works Company ( AWK  ), trading higher by about 1.4% and The York Water Company ( YORW  ), trading up by about 1.4% on Tuesday.  makeArticleAd();      VIDEO: Tuesday Sector Leaders: Precious Metals, Water     Utilities
